Text.Page:
Okay, I've made the potion according to the recipe's specifications.

Bring it to {@LinkCreature:216#1010#Sadnica} and hope for the best.

One way or the other, we won't have to worry about him anymore.

Don't tell Alethea I said that.

Oh. Oh dear.

Well, you did the best you could. No one can say otherwise.

Do give my condolences to Alethea.

I see. So you tried to save him, but...I see.

I can't ask for more than what you've done. Thank you.

Can I have a moment alone?
